casebody.data:
Thomas HOWARD, as Personal Representative of the Estate of William A. Howard, Sr., Appellant,
v.
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO COMPANY, and Philip Morris USA, Inc., a foreign corporation, Appellees. Case No. 2D16-3776 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed November 15, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
